channel.title: BM View Roll in Half Life 2?
channel.description:
Hello,
While some dislike the View Roll effect in Black Mesa, I love it. So what I'm wondering, after both searching this forum and the interwebs, is if there is a mod, or way of ripping the effect out of BM, for attaining the same view roll effect in Half-Life 2 and it's associated episodes? I have seen the cl_viewroll command but it doesn't appear to work in source, or at least no longer works as of some update. Any information would be appreciated!
Cheers
